data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_015_0
data.text: ON THE LOWER HALLS, ROBIN AND HIS MEN BATTER THE CASTLE SOLDIERS BACK IN FURIOUS SWORDPLAN...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_015_1
data.text: THE LINE BREAKS ! THE VARLETS GIVE WAY ! WE'VE GOT THEM, SIRE!

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_015_2
data.text: YIELD, GUARDS! BACK, YOU ROGUES, OR YOU FALL UNDER OUR STEEL!

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_015_3
data.text:
WHILE HIGH IN THE CASTLE, THE
                OTHER IN- VADING ARCHERS BATTER THE EARL
                AND HIS SWORDS DOWN THE MAIN
                STAIR...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_015_4
data.text: THE CASTLE RINGS WITH THE CLASH OF STEEL AND SOON THE EARL AND HIS FORCES ARE PRESSED INTO THE BANQUET ROOM...CAUGHT BETWEEN TWO OUTLAN AANKS...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_015_6
data.text: ENOUGH ! WE SURRENDER! HOLD YOUR STEEL!

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_015_7
data.text:
THE BATTLING OUTLAWS FAN OUT,
                SURROUND THE GUARDS WITH DARTING, SWINGING
                BLADES...THEY START TO HURL ASIDE THEIR
                WEAPONS, BEG FOR MERCY...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_015_8
data.text: AH THE NOBLE EARL! STAND, EARL AND DEFEND YOURSELF!

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_015_10
data.text:
AS ROBIN ADVANCES ON THE
                EARL, THE TRERCHEROUS NOBLE FLINGS HIS SWORD FULL
                AT THE OUTLAW'S HEAD...

data.name: MCCALL_ROBINHOOD_T31_015_11
data.text:
IN A FLASH, ROBIN TWISTS
                ASIDE, LUNGES FORWARD... HIS STEEL RIPS TROUGH THE
                EARL'S CLOTHING,PINS HIM HELPLESSLY TO THE BACK OF
                A HEAVY CHAIR BEHIND... 13
